About.Name: Anh Pham
About.AboutText: Hi, I am Anh and I’m currently a mechanical engineering student at SPU, and I’m interested in CAD modeling work and Mechanical Construction work, and throughout my education I have gained a lot of experiences with Soildworks and different other analysis programs, like Tracker, Excel, and have a grasp on the MATLAB language. So I am looking for a internship after college that will help me really honed the skills of communication with others for more future positions.

Experience.ExperienceText: Thanks to my college journey I was able to get where I am. Starting with smaller projects like a spaghetti bridge and eventually moving up to Junior Design and creating a linear belt driven rail, and a lead screw lift system. Currently I am working on a combination of a remote controlled rover combined with a mechanical robot arm, and the goal is to hold a construction sign in high traffic areas.
Experience.EducationText: With my Mechanical Engineer education I am hoping to use it to develop world changing technology
Experience.Role: Physics Learning Assistant, Linear Algebra Grader
Experience.EmploymentText: These jobs are a good way for me to remind myself of past knowledge and to support students educationally
Experience.SkillsText: These skills were developed both in and out of classes and it showcase my creatitvity and data tracking skills
